entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as one of the main characters who are still wearing dress robes. He is also referred to as having kept the Invisibility Cloak on him last year.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is mentioned as one of the main characters who are still wearing dress robes and is being ogled by a group of merry pub-goers.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is mentioned as having the Invisibility Cloak and clothes for both Harry and Ron.

entities.name: invisibility cloak
entities.description: The Invisibility Cloak is mentioned as something that Harry kept on him last year but forgot to bring this time.

relationships.description: Harry owned the Invisibility Cloak, which he kept with him last year.
Hermione possesses the Invisibility Cloak and is able to use it to help Harry and Ron.
